name: Manipulate (Azsimuth)
description:
Manipulate is the abomination that was the result of a long crunch time. The game features 8-bit ascetics. You play by guiding the object, you have no control over. Press the digit keys to disable blocks. There are 4 blocks wich you can toggle. The game has 10 Levels. I do not own the music. It is from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Patch Notes:

1.5 ((2020 07  11 11:07 AM, while the jam is running )

-Fixed Bugs

1.1 & 1.2 & 1.3 (2020 07  11 10:39 AM, while the jam is running )

-Fixed bugs that forbid completion of the game.
